attributes.action: Scrap the idea that universities can discriminate against children based on parental qualifications or ethnicity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should children whose parents went to University be less able to attend than some-one whose parents did not go to University? And why the bias based on ethnicity?
If a childs background is to play a part in such decisions, find out about each child background, not generalise about all. But which should background play a part at all? Why is not ability considered? Why are you basing FE funding on such a bad idea?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
